positions.name: Senior Architect
responsibilities: Maintained digital ecommerce site, facilitating purchase of digital comics, as well as the delivery of the digital content from Amazon S3/Cloudfront
Developed frontend features using HTML/CSS and jQuery to provide the best experience possible for our users
Engineered backend solutions for our Django ecommerce site, supporting new features
Integrated external services (such as Apple App Store and Google Play) to automatically synchronize our data across the web
Streamlined performance by identifying pain points, fine tuning database queries and slow code, effective use of caching
Overhauled out-of-date systems based on the best available tools, and lessons learned over years of active upkeep and bug fixing
Designed internal facing tools, working closely with internal customers to gather specifications and deliver the most useful solutions
Created a custom asynchronous task manager to replace Celery / RabbitMQ so that we could monitor and manage our tasks directly in the Django admin
